argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ceqsalg.1 | |- F/ x ps |
| 2 |  | ceqsalg.2 | |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_bj-elisset | |- ( A e. V -> E. x x = A ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_bj-ceqsalg0 | |- ( E. x x = A -> ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) ) |
\
 Remove from ~ ceqsalg dependency on ~ ax-ext (and on ~ df-cleq and ~ df-v ).  See also ~ bj-ceqsalgv .  (Contributed by BJ, 12-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
